import React from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import { createStructuredSelector} from 'reselect' import { selectCartItems, selectCartTotal} from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import './checkout.styles.scss' import CheckoutItem from '../../components/checkout-item' const CheckoutPage = ({ cartItems, total}) => { return (
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ cartItems.map( cartItem => ( ) ) }
TOTAL: ${total}
); } const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems: selectCartItems, total: selectCartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutPage);
